1:
Praise Yahweh.\q Blessed is the man who obeys Yahweh,
\q who greatly delights in his commandments.
\q
2:
His descendants will be powerful on earth;\q the descendants of the godly man will be blessed.


\q
3:
Wealth and riches are in his house;\q his righteousness will endure forever.
\q
4:
Light shines in the darkness for the godly person;\q he is gracious, merciful, and just.
\q
5:
It goes well for the man who deals graciously and lends money,\q who conducts his affairs with honesty.


\q
6:
For he will never be moved;\q the righteous person will be remembered forever.
\q
7:
He does not fear bad news;\q he is confident, trusting in Yahweh.


\q
8:
His heart is tranquil, without fear,\q until he looks in triumph over his adversaries.
\q
10:
The wicked person will see this and be angry;\q he will gnash with his teeth and melt away;
\q the desire of the wicked people will perish.
